blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: This app is a simple LAN messaging app, allowing users to communicate through the network. It was interesting to learn more about backend interactions between users. Ideally you can have one computer running it on a local network, and then all the users on that network are able to communicate with each other through the app. In the future it might be a good idea to have it running on a server and then users can create chats between each other, like WhatsApp or something like that, but for now this works great.
